mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.start_time applyStartTime, a.end_time applyEndTime, b.match_group_name groupName, b.free, b.quota, b.title venueName, b.zone_name zoneName, b.address addres, b.startTime ticketStartTime, b.endTime ticketEndTime, ( SELECT min(begin_time) startTime FROM match_venue WHERE zone_id = b.matchZoneId ) minTime, ( SELECT max(end_time) endTime FROM match_venue WHERE zone_id = b.matchZoneId ) maxTime, ( SELECT count(*) FROM match_participant WHERE group_id = a.match_group_id AND zone_id = b.matchZoneId ) count, b.groupId, b.matchZoneId zoneId FROM match_group_and_zone a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.match_group_name, a.free, a.quota, a.id groupId, b.title, b.address, b.matchZoneId, b.zone_name, b.startTime, b.endTime FROM match_group a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.title, a.address, a.matchZoneId, a.zone_name, a.endTime, a.startTime, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( a.group_ids, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) groupId FROM ( SELECT a.zone_name, b.* FROM match_zone a INNER JOIN ( SELECT zone_id matchZoneId, group_ids, title, address, sort, end_time endTime, begin_time startTime FROM match_venue ) b ON a.id = b.matchZoneId WHERE a.match_id = #{match_id} ) a INNER JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH(a.group_ids) - LENGTH( REPLACE (a.group_ids, ',', '') ) + 1 ) ORDER BY a.sort ) b ON a.id = b.groupId ) b ON a.match_group_id = b.groupId WHERE a.is_zone_time = 0

SELECT DISTINCT a.start_time applyStartTime, a.end_time applyEndTime, b.match_group_name groupName, b.free, b.quota, b.title venueName, b.zone_name zoneName, b.address addres, b.startTime ticketStartTime, b.endTime ticketEndTime, ( SELECT min(begin_time) startTime FROM match_venue WHERE zone_id = b.matchZoneId ) minTime, ( SELECT max(end_time) endTime FROM match_venue WHERE zone_id = b.matchZoneId ) maxTime, ( SELECT count(*) FROM match_participant WHERE group_id = a.match_group_id AND zone_id = b.matchZoneId ) count, b.groupId, b.matchZoneId zoneId FROM match_group_and_zone a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.match_group_name, a.free, a.quota, a.id groupId, b.title, b.address, b.matchZoneId, b.zone_name, b.startTime, b.endTime FROM match_group a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.title, a.address, a.matchZoneId, a.zone_name, a.endTime, a.startTime, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( a.group_ids, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) groupId FROM ( SELECT a.zone_name, b.* FROM match_zone a INNER JOIN ( SELECT zone_id matchZoneId, group_ids, title, address, (SELECT DISTINCT sort FROM match_venue WHERE a.sort=sort) sort, end_time endTime, begin_time startTime FROM match_venue a WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM match_venue WHERE zone_id=a.zone_id AND sort < a.sort) ) b ON a.id = b.matchZoneId WHERE a.match_id = #{match_id} ) a INNER JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH(a.group_ids) - LENGTH( REPLACE (a.group_ids, ',', '') ) + 1 ) ORDER BY a.sort ) b ON a.id = b.groupId ) b ON a.match_group_id = b.groupId WHERE a.is_zone_time = 0

SELECT e.id matchId, e.title title, e.sub_title subTitle, e.match_kind kind, e.match_image_url matchImageUrl, e.match_status matchStatus, r.organizer_name organizer, (select COUNT(*) FROM match_participant WHERE match_id = e.id AND `status` = '2') as participantSum, u.nickname organizerName, ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( FROM_DAYS( TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(u.birthday) ), '%Y' ) + 0 ) AS organizerAge, u.sex organizerSex, u.credit organizerCredit,(DATEDIFF(p.begin_time,NOW())) AS toBeginDay FROM match_event e INNER JOIN match_review r ON r.organizer_kind = '0' AND r.match_id = e.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = e.initiator_id INNER JOIN match_progress p ON p.match_id = e.id and p.sort = '0'+0 WHERE e.initiator_id = #{user_id} and e.is_approved = '1'
LIMIT #{page_count},#{page_size}

SELECT e.id matchId, e.title title, e.sub_title subTitle, e.match_kind kind, e.match_image_url matchImageUrl, e.match_status matchStatus, r.organizer_name organizer, (select COUNT(*) FROM match_participant WHERE match_id = e.id AND `status` = '2') as participantSum, u.nickname organizerName, ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( FROM_DAYS( TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(u.birthday) ), '%Y' ) + 0 ) AS organizerAge, u.sex organizerSex, u.credit organizerCredit, (DATEDIFF(p.begin_time,NOW())) AS toBeginDay FROM match_event e INNER JOIN match_review r ON r.organizer_kind = '0' AND r.match_id = e.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = e.initiator_id INNER JOIN match_progress p ON p.match_id = e.id and p.sort = '0'+0 WHERE e.id IN (SELECT match_id FROM match_participant WHERE user_id = #{userId})

SELECT e.id matchId, e.title title, e.sub_title subTitle, e.match_kind kind, e.match_image_url matchImageUrl, e.match_status matchStatus, r.organizer_name organizer, (select COUNT(*) FROM match_participant WHERE match_id = e.id AND `status` = '2') as participantSum, u.nickname organizerName, ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( FROM_DAYS( TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(u.birthday) ), '%Y' ) + 0 ) AS organizerAge, u.sex organizerSex, u.credit organizerCredit, (DATEDIFF(p.begin_time,NOW())) AS toBeginDay FROM match_event e INNER JOIN match_review r ON r.organizer_kind = '0' AND r.match_id = e.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = e.initiator_id INNER JOIN match_progress p ON p.match_id = e.id and p.sort = '0'+0 WHERE e.is_approved = '1' limit #{start}, #{size}

SELECT e.id matchId, e.title title, e.sub_title subTitle, e.match_kind kind, e.match_image_url matchImageUrl, e.match_status matchStatus, r.organizer_name organizer, (select COUNT(*) FROM match_participant WHERE match_id = e.id AND `status` = '2') as participantSum, u.nickname organizerName, ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( FROM_DAYS( TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(u.birthday) ), '%Y' ) + 0 ) AS organizerAge, u.sex organizerSex, u.credit organizerCredit, (DATEDIFF(p.begin_time,NOW())) AS toBeginDay FROM match_event e INNER JOIN match_review r ON r.organizer_kind = '0' AND r.match_id = e.id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = e.initiator_id INNER JOIN match_progress p ON p.match_id = e.id and p.sort = '0'+0 WHERE e.initiator_id = #{user_id} AND e.is_approved=#{is_approved} ORDER BY e.pass_time desc limit 1

SELECT a.credit, a.sex, ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( FROM_DAYS( TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(a.birthday) ), '%Y' ) + 0 ) AS age, b.id matchId, b.title, b.sub_title subTitle, b.match_status matchStatus, b.match_image_url url, b.pass_time passTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match_participant WHERE is_pay=1) applyCount FROM user a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM match_event WHERE initiator_id=#{user_id} AND is_approved=1 ORDER BY pass_time LIMIT 1 ) b ON a.id = b.initiator_id
